## vela comp show

get component detail

### Synopsis

get component detail, including arguments of workload and trait

```
vela comp show <COMPONENT-NAME> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
vela comp show <COMPONENT-NAME>
```

```
  -h, --help   help for show
```
